artist: Francisco Jose de Goya y Lucientes
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of prisoner bound into crouched position with hands clasped together; ankles bound in heavy shackles; head with shaggy beard and hair turned to the L
marks:
Inscription and Marks

under image, typed: Gazet
title: Tan bárbara la seguridad como el delito
